statements.statement: SELECT /*+ 송재복::/gcb/etcInfMg/gcbTblDfinInfInqJebi/GcbTblDfinInfInq/retvLstGcbClmn */ A.COMMENTS 테이블명_V60 , B.COLUMN_ID 순번_N3 , B.COLUMN_NAME 컬럼명_V30 , B.DATA_TYPE 컬럼타입_V15 , DECODE(B.DATA_TYPE, 'NUMBER' , B.DATA_PRECISION , 'TIMESTAMP(6)' , 20 , B.DATA_LENGTH ) 컬럼길이_N5 , DECODE(B.DATA_TYPE, 'NUMBER' , B.DATA_SCALE , 0 ) 컬럼소수점길이_N3 , DECODE(B.NULLABLE , 'N', '0' , 'Y', '1' , '' ) 여백허용여부_V1 , DECODE(D.COLUMN_POSITION, NULL, '0', '1') 컬럼PK여부_V1 , CASE WHEN B.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' THEN CASE WHEN B.DATA_SCALE > 0 THEN 2 WHEN B.DATA_PRECISION > 14 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END ELSE 0 END 데이터타입_N1 , DECODE(B.DATA_TYPE, 'NUMBER' , DECODE(B.DATA_SCALE,0, B.DATA_PRECISION +1 , B.DATA_PRECISION +2) , 'TIMESTAMP(6)' , 20 , B.DATA_LENGTH ) 데이터길이_N5 FROM SYS.ALL_TAB_COMMENTS A , SYS.ALL_TAB_COLUMNS B , SYS.ALL_CONSTRAINTS C , SYS.ALL_IND_COLUMNS D WHERE A.OWNER = 'INSTC' AND A.TABLE_NAME = ${테이블ID_V9} AND A.TABLE_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND B.OWNER = A.OWNER AND B.TABLE_NAME = A.TABLE_NAME AND C.OWNER = B.OWNER AND C.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' AND C.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND D.INDEX_OWNER(+) = C.INDEX_OWNER AND D.INDEX_NAME(+) = C.INDEX_NAME AND D.TABLE_OWNER(+) = B.OWNER AND D.TABLE_NAME(+) = B.TABLE_NAME AND D.COLUMN_NAME(+) = B.COLUMN_NAME ORDER BY B.COLUMN_ID ASC

SELECT /*+ 송재복::/gcb/etcInfMg/gcbTblDfinInfInqJebi/GcbTblDfinInfInq/retvLstGcbTbl */ A.TABLE_NAME 테이블ID_V9 , A.COMMENTS 테이블명_V60 FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS A WHERE A.OWNER = 'INSTC' AND A.TABLE_NAME LIKE 'TB'|| UPPER(${어플리케이션코드}) || '%' AND LENGTH(A.TABLE_NAME) = 9 ORDER BY A.TABLE_NAME ASC
